title: What makes Synthwave different from Trance? - Quora

response.answer_text: Trance :  Trance us uplifting and super pretty with layers of melodic synths, It can be hard and repetitious too, but some folks debate trance’s origins, but it originated in Frankfurt. It started in the 90s. Synthwave :  Synthwave, uses the soundscape of the 80s re-created with new arrangements in a modern package with modern production techniques except with synths from the 80's. Synths, Romplers, and 80s beats e.g. the Linn drum. Think Computer games and filmscoring music.
